title: Could someone put a fricken bell on him or something?
text: A photo of a 2ft Trump! Fufilled Requests Photos of a normal sized trump. Photos/ text/ comments with the aim of bringing in political discussion/ bigotry. Douchbaggery. Photos that are cartoons; before they were /r/TinyTrumps pictures.
